title: how about a reward/achievement system?

embed.description: Here's a playlist to the old team comp videos! https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8AtuFG_YEkxHgnB1NRG95vpw9bLM_M8V

body:
how about a reward/achievement system?
what i mean is like if you get all the zaun champions you get some rp?
or if you win 200 games you get a mystery skin?
what do you think?i dont know but i think its gonna be awesome. more players would play more so they could get all these rewards 
i hope this 'system' would come soon!

replies.body:
And if you haven't been paying attention for the last 4-5 months, they are planning to do so, you cannot directly (i think) gain rp from it, but you can unlock champs for free and get rental skins etc. This can be done by reaching Rank 5 champs I think(?).


I'm not 100% sure on it, but i can assure you I'm[ reading ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html)up on it now!
